reviews.review:
全編グラビティガン＋アリックス無双で
アンチャーテッド＋Portalな雰囲気です。
DOGがかわいい。
短さに対し批判的な意見もありますが
本編の美味しいところがギュッとつまった感じで本編が気に入った人にはおすすめです
Hela Half Life 2 serien är en fantastisk klassiker som har hög omspelbarhet.
Kicks off where Half life 2 left.

Half-Life 2'nin devamı olan bu oyun bana kalırsa en az Half-Life 2 kadar muhteşem. Sanki Half-Life 2 bitmemiş de aralıksız devam ediyormuş gibi hissettirmişti. Citadel'den kaçışımızı konu edinen ve 3 saatlik oynanışı olan (3 saat benim oynama süremdir, eğer benim gibi her şeye meraklı, her yeri görmek isteyen biri değilseniz ve benim kadar kötü oynamıyorsanız daha kısa sürede bitirebilirsiniz XD) bu oyun bana göre Half-Life oyunları tier-list yapılırsa koskocaman bir S'tir. Kesinlikle oynamalısınız. Zaten hikayenin devamı için oynamanız şart.

Неплохое ДЛС, которое заняло у меня 4 часа, не заметил как время пролетело, ну а так это советую для полноты картины купить не только оригинал, но и 2 шикарных дополнения, а насчёт игрового времени, нечего сказать не могу, у меня прохождение заняло 4 часа, а у тебя 2, но одно могу сказать точно, тебе утянет с головой в это краткой повествование, что же было после концовки HALF-LIFE 2!)
Дополнение к оригинальной HL2 хорошая. Оригинальный игровой мир, нереальное погружение в атмосферу игры, правдоподобная физика, персонажи. Советую всем
This in my opinion is the worst half life game I've played.
Прогулки с Алекс, прекрасны всегда) 10 из 10
I sure don't hope this one is generally agreed upon to be the weakest half-life game in its respective franchise.
Its Half-Life... what did you expect? A bear?
Продолжение знаменитой игры 2004 года. Маленькая часть, маленький сюжет, маленький хуй у фримена. короче игра топ!
A bit slow at times but overall a very good sequal.

Always love me some Half Life.  I've played through this game a few times on other platforms, but had way more fun this time on PC.  Can't recommend this game enough, the graphics and game play are still enjoyable after all these years.
Прикольное дополнение ко второй халфе. Все достижения, если постараться можно получить с первого прохождения.
Half Life 2 Efsanesinin devamı, eğer Half Life 2 aldıysanız hikayenin devamını oynamak istiyorsanız kesinlikle almanız gerekir.

This is a good sequel episode to hl 2. it picks right up at the end of hl 2 and then continues. it has the same feel etc. Its really nice seeing the story progressing etc. Im going to play Hl 2 Episode 2 next, Im hyped"
I got all myself stolen again and had to start all over! But dog is in the game so I give it a high grade
Short but all around well developed game, following the events at the end of Hl2.
gordon freeman turuncu olduğu için hay layf everininde levyeyi kullanabilen tek kişidir
Прикольно, но как же скучно просто стрелять и бегать с точки А в точку Б
Tiene los bichos que mas mala vibra dan en todo half life

Весьма достойное дополнение (в данном случае, продолжение) к основному сюжету Half-Life 2. В определенные моменты игра больше походит на хоррор, и порой обвал пола пугает в разы больше, чем все скримеры из игры вместе взятые.

Однозначно, 5 из 5. И это только первый эпизод... интересно, что ждет во втором?
Shes waiting for you Gordon, in the test chamber - Dr. Kleiner
мне очень понравилась игра правда жаль то что не выйдет Half-Life 2:Episode treee
SHIT THE BEST PART OF THE GAME IS WHEN GOD DIPS HIS ANUS INTO CITY 17
really good sequel, very fun gameplay
Have to love the save point that I was getting shot by enemy, so that I can constantly die after respawn.

Good, solid mechanics. Feels less substantial than the base game or episode 2, and more like a mad dash through the levels to the end. Adds a few new ideas, such as controlling the flow of enemies such as antlions by plugging up their spawners with large physics objects. Can recommend if you liked half life 2 and want to play more game like it, can't if you don't

Another excellent game in the Half Life franchise! 
This one is a lot shorter, but the bullet action and story are still amazing!
The game is kinda slow but its good :/
Часть игры серии Халф-Лайф называется - Унеси свою попу из города, а дальше сами додумаем сюжет)
Good lore and gameplay overall just love the Half Life series.
A great expansion to an already great game.

It starts with one
One thing I don't know why
It doesn't even matter how hard you try
Keep that in mind, I designed this rhyme
To explain in due time
All I know
Time is a valuable thing
Watch it fly by as the pendulum swings
Watch it count down to the end of the day
The clock ticks life away
It's so unreal
Didn't look out below
Watch the time go right out the window
Tryin' to hold on, did-didn't even know
I wasted it all just to watch you go
I kept everything inside and even though I tried
It all fell apart
What it meant to me will eventually
Be a memory of a time when-
I tried so hard and got so far
But in the end, it doesn't even matter
I had to fall to lose it all
But in the end, it doesn't even matter
One thing, I don't know why
It doesn't even matter how hard you try
Keep that in mind, I designed this rhyme
To remind myself how I tried so hard
In spite of the way you were mockin' me
Acting like I was part of your property
Remembering all the times you fought with me
I'm surprised it got so far
Things aren't the way they were before
You wouldn't even recognize me anymore
Not that you knew me back then
But it all comes back to me in the end
You kept everything inside and even though I tried
It all fell apart
What it meant to me will eventually
Be a memory of a time when-
I tried so hard and got so far
But in the end, it doesn't even matter
I had to fall to lose it all
But in the end, it doesn't even matter
I've put my trust in you
Pushed as far as I can go
For all this
There's only one thing you should know
I've put my trust in you
Pushed as far as I can go
For all this
There's only one thing you should know
I tried so hard and got so far
But in the end, it doesn't even matter
I had to fall to lose it all
But in the end, it doesn't even matter
Its a pretty good game, but its short 3 hour length makes it a bit worse. if you played Half Life 2 and enjoyed it, there's no reason not to play Episode 1
A atenção do G-Man agora está voltada à outra pessoa

La historia es bastante bueno. Tiene una continuación bastante interesante del Half-Life 2. Me divertí bastante y me pegue algunos sustos por qué no me esperaba en algunas ocasiones. Es muy buen juego aparte. Y recomiendo jugarlo para continuar la historia de Half-Life.
dr kleiner telling the citizens of earth to have sex is a major plot point of this game

I honestly don't get all the hate for this episode, besides the annoying Strider Bossfight. It's nice and pretty great. It shows a lot more insight about how rebels operate compared to combine and shows more of the Citadel, aswell as CITY-17.

Great sequel and a big progress in the graphics after the 'Half-Life 2' game, great way to entertain yourself for sure. I'm going to check out 'Half-Life 2: Episode 2', looking forward for the next Valve's Half-Life release. 9/10
I will continue to review this when Half Life 3 releases.
Frenetico y entretenido. Para ser una continuacion de Half Life 2 es mas que perfecta. Recomendado.

This isn't half life 2, like, at all. this episode of "half life 2" is so boring ill be surprised if people could find this "fun". the only thing that was fun about this episode was alt-f4ing out. Where's the waves of combine soldiers? where's the blood? the violence? i dont wanna sit doing the elevator puzzle for 10 minutes, in the dark needing to focus on zombies that come out of no where. now the topic of the zombies in the dark. i tested this theory. the zombies are godd@mn ghosts. i cleared the whole elevator level, and i mean deepcleaned that whole level. not a zombie. flashlight goes dead. awesome, because 20 zombies spawn. i die because of low ammo (thanks valve) and low flashlight battery (thanks valve). the only thing this episode is good for is the addition to gmod, of which is the zombine.
de lo mejor que hay en PC
Should have been part of the main game, still very fun though.
